content: easiest baby hat ever by jackie henderson are you looking for a quick and easy baby hat this is it this knits up super fast it is knitted in the round so no seaming and there are no decreases for the top this is perfect for a last minute baby gift or knit up several for your own little loved ones link to you tube video with full instructions on knitting this hat https //youtu be/cbfplfgjai8 sizes infant toddler yarn worsted weight hobby lobby yarn bee softstitch © jackie henderson yardage approx 100 yards needle us size 7 16 inch circular needles gauge 4 = 26 stitches in 1x1 ribbing final dimensions approx 5 5 x8 5 6 x9 5 abbreviations co = cast on p = purl k = knit k2tog = knit two together pattern co 66 80 stitches join in the round careful not to twist your stitches round 1 *k1 p1* repeat to end of round repeat round 1 until hat measures 8 5 9 5 from cast on this makes it long enough for a folded over brim if you do not wish to have a folded over brim repeat till 6 5 7 5 from cast on edge optional last row if you prefer to not have so many stitches left on the needle to cinch together at the end you can do your final round with a k2tog repeat this will lessen the number of stitches on your needle by half this is completely optional but may make it easier to close up the top at the end cut at least a 10 tail of your working yarn and thread yarn onto a darning needle slip all stitches from the knitting needle onto the darning needle so that all stitches are threaded onto the yarn pull tight to cinch close the top of the hat insert your needle to the inside of the hat and thread through that final round of stitches again and continue to pull tight to close up the hole then secure it shut with a double knot add a pom pom if desired this is so cute either way weave in ends and enjoy or make another one © jackie henderson
